title: Workshop on Utilizing Knowledge-Based Architecture for e-Learning Design Support

context.prior_knowledge: Basic e-Learning Design Experience and Expertise in Scientific Disciplines
context.additional_context: Short-term intensive course for current science practitioners conducted in a smartphone-based real-time online environment, emphasizing evaluation of practical work application through project-based assessment

learning_goals: Learners will independently operate the e-learning design process at least 80% of the time using knowledge-based architecture components.
Learners will systematically classify and retrieve science education content using metadata management tools.
When designing real-time online activities based on collaborative learning theory, educational effectiveness will improve by at least 20%.

resources: Access to Science Field OER Repository
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
